      • load

        public static PermissionControl load(int userId,
                     boolean force)
        Load user's roles.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's id
        force - If true, forces a reload. If false, the call will be ignored if the roles are already loaded.
        Returns:
        PermissionControl
        See Also:
        load(int), load(User), load(User, boolean)

      • load

        public static PermissionControl load(User user,
                     boolean force)
        Load user's roles.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to load
        force - If true, forces a reload. If false, the call will be ignored if the roles are already loaded.
        Returns:
        PermissionControl
        See Also:
        load(int), load(int, boolean), load(User)

      • canAccess

        public static boolean canAccess(String roleName)
        Check if the logged user has access to the role. This method gets user's id from its session.
        Parameters:
        roleName - The role name to verity
        Returns:
        true if the user has access to the role, false if access is denied
        Throws:
        SecurityLoadException - if case of erros while trying to load the roles
        See Also:
        canAccess(String, String), canAccess(int, String, String)

      • canAccess

        public static boolean canAccess(int userId,
                String roleName)

      • canAccess

        public static boolean canAccess(String roleName,
                String value)
        Check if the logged user has access to the role. This method gets user's id from its session.
        Parameters:
        roleName - The role name to verify
        value - The value relacted to the role to verify for access
        Returns:
        true if the user has access to the role, false if access is denied

      • canAccess

        public static boolean canAccess(int userId,
                String roleName,
                String value)

      • get

        public static PermissionControl get(int userId)
        Gets the permssion schema of some specific user. If the roles of the user aren't loaded yet, a call to load(int) will be made.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's id to get the permissions
        Returns:
        The PermissionControl instance related to the user id passed as argument
        Throws:
        SecurityLoadException - if case of erros while trying to load the roles

      • add

        public static void add(int userId,
       PermissionControl pc)
        Adds a new permission control schema to the cache
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's id to associate with the schema
        pc - The PermissionControl instance to add

      • remove

        public static void remove(int userId)
        Remove the cached roles from a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user to remove from the cache

      • clean

        public static void clean()
        Clear all cached security entries.
